Name: Botanic Gardens of Adelaide and State Herbarium

About.Hours & facilities: Open by appointment. Reference assistance available in person and by mail. No copying services available.

About.Access: Approval in writing must be obtained for access. Advance notice of visit required and reasons for access.

About.Acquisition focus: Staff records, photographs of the Gardens, records of purchases, accessions and biographical information of historical importance.

About.Major holdings: Various photographers: Photographs c1870- . Botanic Gardens: Minutes of Board 1855- (0.5m); Staff records 1855- . Accounts 1855- .
